creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: small panda figure with PR arm raised; stands on PR foot on square base covered in strips of mother-of-pearl; bear is covered in mother-of-pearl chips with black lacquered face and inner ears; eyes, nose, and cheeks painted in gold
markings: Seal on back L corner of base
title: Bear: Glittering
